hint: Push filters early into CTEs, convert implicit joins to explicit joins, and pre-filter dimension tables to reduce join cardinality before set operations.
Isolate date_dim filtering into a CTE, pre-fetch filtered dimension tables, and restructure with explicit joins to optimize the repeated date range scans across three sales channels.
Materialize all filtered dimension and fact tables into separate CTEs, then restructure EXCEPT operations using precomputed sets to eliminate redundant scans and leverage temporary materialization.

Transform EXCEPT operations using NOT EXISTS anti-joins or window deduplication, pre-compute base customer set once, and apply channel-specific conditions as correlated filters to avoid triple scanning.
